item.description:
Hello Informal Nation,

On Saturday June 23rd there will be a team competition hosted by the Somerville Road Runners and will feature several different running clubs from the area.

Register Here with TMIRCE

The TMIRCE team will have a great mix of Fast and Fun Runners. We'll be happy to have you.

There will be pizza at the end of the run and beers afterwards at the pub. There is a $10 registration fee which goes to the team fee! I'm working on getting the payment for this set up through paypal or otherwise i can take payment at the next few TMIRCE events! Look forward to seeing you there!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE runs the 26 x 1 relay
